StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateAddress]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int AS
SELECT CA.ADDRESS_TYPE, CA.STREET_ADDRESS, COALESCE(CA.CITY_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS CITY_CODE, COALESCE(CA.COUNTY_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS COUNTY_CODE, COALESCE(CA.STATE_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS STATE_CODE, CA.ZIPCODE, COALESCE(GL.STATE_TEXT, SPACE(0)) AS STATE_TEXT, COALESCE(GL.COUNTY_TEXT, SPACE(0)) AS COUNTY_TEXT, COALESCE(GL.CITY_TEXT, SPACE(0)) AS CITY_TEXT FROM CANDIDATE_ADDRESS CA LEFT OUTER JOIN GEO_LOCATION GL ON (CA.STATE_CODE = GL.STATE_CODE AND CA.COUNTY_CODE = GL.COUNTY_CODE AND CA.CITY_CODE = GL.CITY_CODE) WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY CA.ADDRESS_TYPE
